paragraph.value: We conduct an ablation study to validate our hypothesis of using the complete context versus using only one of the three types of contexts in a bilingual multi-speaker conversation: (i) current turn, (ii) previous turns in current language, and (iii) previous turns in the other language. The results for En-De are reported in Table 4. We see
